DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of the Endograb system which is an internal laparoscopic retractor device. This retractor device is inserted into the abdominal cavity through one of the 5 mm trocars and obviates the need for a separate dedicated trocar for retraction. Therefore enables the reduction of the number of abdominal incisions in a laparoscopic operation.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Laparoscopic Internal Retractor Device
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic cholelithiasis Age 1860 ASA 12 Able to sign an informed consent ASA 3 or more Acute cholecystitis Choledocholithiasis Coagulation disorders Patients on blood thinners Use of Steroids
